forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city is cloaked in a gentle veil of clouds, a tranquil reminder of the cool marine layer that often graces this coastal haven. The temperature lingers around 56 degrees, a comfortable ambiance that invites a soft sweater or light jacket. As the morning progresses into Friday, the clouds will gradually yield to the sun, which will emerge from behind the haze, coaxing the temperature upwards. By afternoon, the mercury will hover around a pleasant 62 degrees, with a refreshing westerly breeze dancing through the streets, providing a gentle rustle among the urban foliage.

The day promises a delightful mix of sun and clouds, a canvas upon which you might enjoy a quiet stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely coffee in one of the neighborhood cafés. As the wind picks up, reaching gusts of up to 30 mph, it may be wise to secure your hat and embrace layers that can be adjusted as the warmth of the sun emerges. Whether you’re inclined to explore the hidden alleys of Chinatown or visit a local gallery, today’s weather offers a serene backdrop for the simple pleasures of city life.
